element.label: ProblemDiagnosisItem
element.definition: Details about a single identified health condition, injury, disability or any other issue which impacts on the physical, mental and/or social well-being of an individual.

element.label: ProblemDiagnosisName
element.definition: Identification of the problem or diagnosis, by name.

element.label: ClinicalDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the problem or diagnosis.

element.label: Severity
element.definition: An assessment of the overall severity of the problem or diagnosis.

element.label: BodySite
element.definition: Identification of a simple or precoordinated body site for the location of the problem or diagnosis.

element.label: [AnatomicalLocationItem]
element.definition: Specific structured details about a single anatomical location.

element.label: DateClinicallyRecognised
element.definition: Estimated or actual date/time the diagnosis or problem was recognised by a healthcare professional.

element.label: ActiveInactiveStatus
element.definition: The activity or clinical impact of the problem or diagnosis on the individual.

element.label: CourseDescription
element.definition: Narrative description about the course of the problem or diagnosis since onset.

element.label: Comment
element.definition: Additional narrative about the problem or diagnosis not captured in other fields.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this problem or diagnosis was last updated.

element.label: ProblemDiagnosisExclusionItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement about no known problems or diagnoses, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: ProblemDiagnosisExclusionStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that there are no known problems or diagnoses for inclusion.

element.label: ProblemDiagnosisAbsenceItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement of absence of information about known problems or diagnoses, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: ProblemDiagnosisAbsenceStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that no information is available about problems or diagnoses.
